ruling: - [[Superancient Deepsea King Coelacanth]]'s effect that negates card effects when it is targeted is a Quick Effect. This effect can be activated multiple times during the same turn and it can be activated during the Damage Step.
- When [[Exiled Force]]'s effect targets [[Superancient Deepsea King Coelacanth]], [[Exiled Force]]'s effect can be negated even though it is now in the Graveyard.
